name: PANDECROWN
description:
you can help me to develop the game by downloading here or for free on our website

https://killominastudio.wixsite.com/killominastudio-1

MAIN FEATURES OF THE GAME

Like New World, a group of people formed the New Coalition Killomina Corporation.

The New Killomina Corporation Coalition has only one goal: to create

a perfect world where only that group will rule the world, or what's left of it.

Killomina is believed to be behind the pandemic, no one has achieved anything, maybe you have tasted it!

It is a 2022 survival horror game developed by KILLOMINA.

Players control themselves, but they are not in the Killomina Corporation's medical treatment center.

Your journey to the city where your son worked on survival horror elements

as a player, you will have to scour areas for items and manage resources.

However, where you need to find cards with a password to be able to open doors,

and chests, so he can continue his journey.

The story is based on Covid that ends up becoming an epidemic.

This will be the first and will be more focused on the story surrounding the pandemic.

The mechanics of inventory management, with dashboard and dashboard

Additional items capacity for better storage space.

You will find long supplies, weapons, upgrades and items along the way and

in villages, houses, abandoned businesses and others.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

MINIMUM:

Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Processor: 4 physical cores

Memory: 8 GB of RAM

Video Card: 2048 MB of VRAM

DirectX: Version 11

Offer: 12 GB of available space

RECOMMENDED:

Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Processor: 8 physical cores

Memory: 16 GB of RAM

Video Card: 4096 MB of VRAM

DirectX: Version 12

Offer: 12 GB of available space
